Articles.Content:
Hi, i am Zekos and i started playing KSP at version 1.02. Recently i started playing Realism Overhaul, Real Solar System with RP-0 and also using kOS for every launch. I will not make a fantasy type story like the experts in the field, but instead i will just log my missions and thoughts about how the career progress. I will link all vessels links, kOS scripts used and every other information i can.


Now some more information about the career, i don`t know how to make planes so don`t expect a lot on that front. Also i didn`t write all the kOS scripts by my self, i copied a lot from a lot of people that had them available, I changed them, add login to them. Everyone is welcome to use my version of the scripts freely. I will try and gather all my sources here later on.


I use a lot of mods, i have a custom upgraded installation to x64 OSX KSP 1.05. Mods are installed throught CKAN and is generaly RO with suggested mods.
Mod list -Early April 2016.
